content: 2 half_double_crochet in next st * join with slip_stitch =50sts round 7 ch2 then *1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 4 sts 2 half_double_crochet in next st * join with slip_stitch =60sts round 8 ch2 then *1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 2 half_double_crochet in next st * join with slip_stitch =70sts round 9 18 ch2 1 half_double_crochet in each st around join with slip_stitch do not fasten_off =70sts note actually it just depends on the head s size you can vary the number of stitches or rounds and/or use a stimesler/bigger hook for a stimesler/bigger hat the earflaps continue and just crochet on the earflaps will be worked in row row 1 ch2 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 14 sts =15sts ©2017 anja welling find wilma spielen on facebook wordpress and ravelry 3 wilmaspielen wordpress com - www facebook com/wilma spielen 980 - http //www ravelry com/people/wilmaspielen -- attention from now on do not make a ch2 at the beginning of each row -- row 2 turn skip 1st st and work 1 half_double_crochet in the row s 2nd st then 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 11 sts and work 1 half_double_crochet-decrease in the last 2 sts of row =13sts row 3 turn skip 1st st and work 1 half_double_crochet in the row s 2nd st then 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 9 sts and work 1 half_double_crochet-decrease in the last 2 sts of row =11sts row 4 turn skip 1st st and work 1 half_double_crochet in the row s 2nd st then 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 7 sts and work 1 half_double_crochet-decrease in the last 2 sts of row = 9sts row 5 turn skip 1st st and work 1 half_double_crochet in the row s 2nd st then 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 5 sts and work 1 half_double_crochet-decrease in the last 2 sts of row =7sts row 6 turn skip 1st st and work 1 half_double_crochet in the row s 2nd st then 1 half_double_crochet in each of the next 3 sts and work 1 half_double_crochet-decrease in the last 2 sts of row =5sts row 7 turn skip 1st st and work 1 half_double_crochet in the row s 2nd st then 1 half_double_crochet in next st and work 1 half_double_crochet-decrease in the last 2 sts of row =3sts row 8 turn skip 1st st and work 1 half_double_crochet in next st fasten_off = 2sts now count 13 sts over the hat s part which you intend to be the later „back of the hat - join thread in the 14th st now work the second earflap just like the first when you will have finished this part you will have a really primo earflap hat but something will still be missing the key part ©2017 anja welling find wilma spielen on facebook wordpress and ravelry 4 wilmaspielen wordpress com - www facebook com/wilma spielen 980 - http //www ravelry com/people/wilmaspielen das huhn - the
